name: Paladin 2
description:
In the days of legends, Brandon the young seeks out a chance to win the title of Paladin that he craves. Accepted as an Apprentice in the Order f Paladins, he must earn that title by undertaking quest after perilous quest. Forming a party of brave warriors, Brandon and his allies will encounter all manner of foe - in castles, open fields and dungeons deep in the earth. Only by proving his bravery and skill will he be able to claim the exalted rank as his own.

  • Paladin 2 - the long-awaited sequel to Omnitrend's popular Paladin!
  • Paladin 2 - an easy-to-play, addictive,  strategy role-playing experience with twenty challenging quests!
  • Become young Brandon - or an Apprentice of your choosing - and advance throught the ranks of the Order of Palaldins!
  • Import your characters from the original Paladin and even from Omnitrend's Breach 2!
  • Lead your men with a refined, easy-to-use point-and-click interface!
